name: Ice Rise
description:
Getting lost in the North Pole, our poor bear is floating through the river on a thin ice with dangerous icebergs around. Push the icebergs away and help him float to his home.

Featuring:
+ Appealing Visuals
+ Seamless Experience
+ Synced Music
+ Easy-to-play yet Hard-to-score High!


Have questions? Please kindly send to pama.setup@amanotes.com
